meanings.definition: A piece of writing included with others in a newspaper, magazine, or other publication.
meanings.sent1: The newspaper included an article about space exploration.
meanings.sent2: She read an interesting article in the magazine.
meanings.sent3: The article about penguins made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His article on friendship touched many hearts.
meanings.sent5: The article on climate change was eye-opening.

meanings.sent1: The antique shop displayed a rare article from the 1800s.
meanings.sent2: He collected articles from different countries.
meanings.sent3: The lost article turned out to be his favorite hat.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a precious article in a museum.
meanings.sent5: The diamond ring was the most valuable article in the collection.

meanings.definition: A section of a legal document or treaty.
meanings.sent1: The article in the contract outlined the payment terms.
meanings.sent2: They discussed each article of the treaty in detail.
meanings.sent3: The article about penalties was surprisingly short.
meanings.sent4: The article on rights was the most debated.
meanings.sent5: The article regarding privacy was crucial for all parties involved.
